Package information

Class MedicalBill

java.lang.Object
information.MedicalBill
public class MedicalBill extends Object
This class represents a Medical Bill or Transaction Receipt Used when issuing bills to patient for payment

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicalBill

      public MedicalBill(String ref, PatientID patientID, TransactionStatus transactionStatus, long totalFee, String appointmentId, String dateOfAppointment)
      Constructs a Transaction Receipt
      Parameters:
      ref - for the transaction reference
      patientID - type PatientID for ID of Patient
      transactionStatus - type TransactionStatus for Status
      totalFee - for total fee: Consultation + medications
      appointmentId - for ID of Appointment
      dateOfAppointment - for the date of appointment

      public boolean getMoreThanOneMonth()
      Returns:
      true if the dateOfAppointment is more than 30 days else false

    • checkMoreThanOneMonth

      public void checkMoreThanOneMonth()
      Parse dateOfAppointment with LocalDate Check if no. of days is more than 30 between dateOfAppointment and now with ChronoUnit setMoreThanOneMonth(true) if more than 30 days.
